      • runHeavyModificationTask

        public void runHeavyModificationTask(Project project,
                                     Document document,
                                     java.lang.Runnable o)
        Allows to temporally suppress document modification tracking. Ex: To perform a task, that might delete whole document and re-create it from scratch. Such modification would destroy all existing ranges. While using `runHeavyModificationTask` would make trackers to compare only starting end finishing document states, ignoring intermediate modifications (because "actual" differences might be small).
